tool_description: Selects appropriate icons and visual elements for resume sections to enhance visual appeal while maintaining professionalism.

industry.description: Target industry for appropriate icon selection

icon_style.description: Icon style preference: minimal, modern, or traditional

error_messages: Empty section types: Provide at least one section type for icon selection.
Invalid industry: Provide a valid industry name.
Invalid icon style: Use one of [minimal, modern, traditional].
Incompatible section type: One or more section types don't support icon enhancement.
usage: Provide section types and industry, optionally specify icon style and ATS safety requirements. Returns icon recommendations with usage guidelines.

recommended_icons.description: List of recommended icons for each section

ats_compatibility.description: Whether selected icons maintain ATS compatibility
